Message:
Humans are helpless in
the face of the stormy sea.
There’s nothing we can do
but accept our fate
and get soaked...

I was gazing out at the lake,
letting the truth of life sink in,
when I heard voices.

Voices so faint,
only a gravekeeper like me
could make them out.

I could hear their
pain and suffering...
Something happened
here a long time ago...

At that moment,
I heard screams
coming from the lake.

I turned to see everyone
cowering in the water,
and in front of them,
a cursed creature!

Right as I was about to
go and save them,
a strange fog fell over me.

Inside the fog,
my late dad appeared
right before my very eyes.

“When the disease
came to our village,
all you did was watch.”

Then, all of a sudden,
I fell right into the lake.

The fog trapped
me in an illusion.
I knew none of this was real,
but I was so scared...
I couldn’t breathe...or move...
